body:
Updates

USR Classifications
  • USR Classifications have been updated to the most recent CMS standards.
    • New zip codes have been added and some USR classifications have to reflect the population density from the latest Census estimates.
    • Effects of this update may be seen in the Competitive Access: Gap Detail report. If a report includes a zip code that has been added, or if the Zip classification has changed, new analysis may not exactly match an analysis that was previously run on that geography.
    • The new classifications will take effect once a project is reloaded, or during the next regular processing.
